title: Fed Leadership Uncertainty And US Travel Requirements
itunes:title: Fed Leadership Uncertainty And US Travel Requirements
description:
Lisa Hornby, the head of US Multi-Sector Fixed Income at Schroders, talks about investment outlook after Lael Brainard was interviewed for Fed chair. CEO of Dream Hotel Group Jay Stein discusses international travelers coming to the US amid new vaccine requirements. Jack Truong, James Hardie CEO, discusses labor shortages and the state of the housing industry. Alex Harris, Bond reporter for Bloomberg News, discusses her Bloomberg “Big Take” story on Reddit’s obsession with the Federal Reserve’s overnight reverse-repurchase agreement facility.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
